data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hoese, Douglass F., Bogorodsky, Sergey V., Mal, Ahmad O. (2015): Description of a new species of Trimma (Perciformes: Gobiidae) from the Red Sea, with a discussion of the generic separation of Trimma and Priolepis, with discussion of sensory papillae terminology. Zootaxa 4027 (4): 538-550, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4027.4.4
